192.168.1.0/ 24 -> 4 Subnets

Subnet = Stealing 
(we can steal 2 bits)
2^n -> 		Subnet	2^2 = 4

24 -> 1111 1111 . 1111 1111. 1111 1111. 0000 0000 = 255.255.255.0

Network  	Subnet 	Host
192.168.1 .00		00 0000	= 192.168.1.0/26
192.168.1 .01 		00 0000 = 192.168.1.64/26
192.168.1 .10 		00 0000 = 192.168.1.128/26
192.168.1 .11 		00 0000 = 192.168.1.192/26

Network = 192.168.1 .00		00 0000	= 192.168.1.0/26
1stHost = 192.168.1 .00		00 0001	= 192.168.1.1/26

3rdLast = 192.168.1 .00		11 1100	= 192.168.1.60/26
2ndLast = 192.168.1 .00		11 1101	= 192.168.1.61/26
LastHost= 192.168.1 .00		11 1110	= 192.168.1.62/26
Broad	= 192.168.1 .00		11 1111	= 192.168.1.63/26
